name: Premium Tier Onboarding
description: White-glove onboarding for Premium tier ($349/month fixed or $249/month + $15 per deletion). Comprehensive service with dedicated support.

config.subject: Personal message from Christopher - {{firstName}}
config.body:
{{firstName}},

I personally wanted to welcome you to Speedy Credit Repair's Premium tier.

With {{negativeItemCount}} items affecting your {{creditScore}} credit score, you've made an excellent choice selecting our most comprehensive program.

config.title: Premium client onboarding - {{firstName}} {{lastName}}

config.subject: Schedule your first Premium strategy call
config.body:
{{firstName}},

Let's schedule your first monthly strategy call.

Pick a time that works for you: {{scheduleCallLink}}

These 30-minute calls are where we review progress, adjust strategy, and plan next steps.

Looking forward to it!

Christopher

config.subject: {{firstName}}, I tried calling you
config.body:
Hi {{firstName}},

I tried reaching you earlier but couldn't connect.

**Let's reschedule:** Pick a time here: {{scheduleCallLink}}

Or call me back anytime: (555) 123-4567

Looking forward to discussing your Premium plan!

Christopher

config.title: Final Premium call attempt - {{firstName}}
config.description: If no response, move to nurture

config.subject: Thanks for your time, {{firstName}}
config.body:
{{firstName}},

I appreciate you taking the time to speak with me about the Premium tier.

I understand it's not the right fit right now.

**Options:**
â€¢ Try Standard tier ($179/month)
